40858812.review:
If you like Hexcells - this is more-of-the-same with some 3D/moving-parts added for good measure - buy it, you'll like it.

If you've not played Hexcells - play that first and then read the above ^^^^

One thing surprised me here - tjhis game shows you the absolute basics and then gets pretty hard, pretty fast!   Within 5 mins you'll be solving puzzles '2 steps ahead in your head' - there's no soft-start here.

As you progress the puzzles seem to get a bit easier - you have 'more clues' for the more complex puzzles but their design is well worth seeing even if they're not always as hard as they are intricate.

Note:  you have to solve each puzzle to unlock the next - I know this bugs some people so I thought I'd mention that.

40822786.review:
Im a big fan of puzzle games like the hexcells series and general puzzles like sudoku and picross. 
This is a great puzzle game that is definitely one of the better that I've played on steam. Introduces new concepts at a good pace. Definitely recommend.
Edit After Completing the Game: One criticism I might add is that sometimes it feels like instead of being challenged by a puzzle im just spending a ton of time rotating blocks around or pressing switches in order to reveal more possible moves.
I completed the game in 2 hours and overall though I would definitely recommend.

40546026.review:
Dans la grande famille pour le moins bigarrée des petits jeux de puzzle qui coûtent une bouchée de pain, mais dont la valeur intrinsèque oscille entre la miette rance et le fond de commerce d'une boulangerie - on dit chocolatine ou pain au chocolat, par chez vous ? -, permettez-moi de vous présenter [i][b]Delete[/b][/i]. Lequel revisite avec ingéniosité le ô combien classique démineur, que tout un chacun connaît pour lui avoir abandonné, un peu malgré soi, quantité de ses heures perdues. Le plus souvent par une après-midi pluvieuse, en proie à une irrésistible apathie. Pour les deux du fond qui ricanent : oui, je vous ai entendus ajouter "[i]sur l'ordi du boulot[/i]".

Sauf que [i][b]Delete[/b][/i] ne se contente pas d'en reprendre bêtement le principe. Il enrichit le concept en lui ajoutant de la profondeur, à plus d'un titre d'ailleurs. C'est à dire qu'il vous faudra désormais compter avec une dimension supplémentaire et ce que ça implique de modifications de perspectives. Ainsi, vous aurez parfois à disposition des boutons qui vous permettront de faire pivoter ou glisser tout ou partie de la figure, après quoi les valeurs affectées aux cases évolueront, en temps réel, selon leur nouvelle position. L'idée est simplissime, j'en conviens, et n'en demeure pas moins d'une étonnante efficacité !

Du reste, sans évoquer son aspect graphique sobre, mais propre, il est très bien réalisé, sélecteur de niveaux y compris. Entendez par là que le hasard n'a jamais sa place dans la résolution des 50 niveaux qui le composent. On pourrait certes déplorer que le challenge ne soit pas plus relevé, encore que quatre échecs vous vaudront de recommencer le niveau en cours, mais le plaisir est bel et bien là. N'est-ce pas l'essentiel ? Challenge d'ailleurs d'autant plus modeste pour qui connaît la série [i][b]Hexcells[/b][/i] sous toutes ses coutures, en ce sens que certaines mécaniques vous rappelleront les codages dont elle usait afin de limiter les cases sur lesquelles porte l'information.

Conclusion, autant [url=http://steamcommunity.com/profiles/76561198164382571/recommended/661430][i][b]Lineway[/b][/i][/url], du même concepteur, était bon, mais dispensable, autant [i][b]Delete[/b][/i] me paraît, dans le genre, incontournable. Pour te dire, s'il advenait que sorte une suite, je signerais sur l'heure !

[h1]Verdict : 4,5/5 - Excellent, à acheter les yeux fermés ![/h1]

[code]Vous avez aimé cette évaluation ? Retrouvez-en d'autres en rejoignant notre groupe de rédaction : [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/onlespreferefroids#curation]On les préfère froids.[/url][/code]

[h1] 让人耳目一新的扫雷游戏	[/h1]

40425961.review: Matthew Brown fans, take note: Delete lovingly rips off almost everything that's great about Hexcells and molds it into cubes, adding an interesting twist where the number indicators change as you rearrange the level. It's very good, go buy it.

40400521.review:
[h1][i]Delete[/i] is a wonderful abstract game that borrows from the right places to combine into an elegant puzzler.[/h1]

If you've played [i]Minesweeper[/i] you already know the rules of [i]Delete[/i].
If you've played [i]Hexcells[/i], you already know (some of) the tricks and twists on the puzzles.

But neither game prepares for the very literal twist of [i]Delete[/i]: rotating, transforming levels.

[h1]Gameplay[/h1]

Unfamiliar with above-mentioned games?

In [i]Delete[/i] a level consists of tiles that are either "red" or not. If it's not, it's got a number stating how many red tiles ("mines") surround it. By deduction, you have to tell which tile is which. No guessing is ever needed, but you can still mis-click a few times before the level is forcibly restarted.

You choose by click of mouse, left or right. You may reverse the order if you prefer at any time.

[h1]Cool levels[/h1]

First levels are just small minesweeper-style puzzles but instead of a plane, they're on surfaces of 3-dimensional objects.

Quickly, new mechanics similar to [i]Hexcells[/i] are introduced: tiles that only point out mines diagonal or perpendicular to them instead of all around them, or mines in a single line.

Finally, game pulls its ultimate twist in: levels, or parts of levels, can be rotated or moved, changing the mine numbers on tiles and opening new hints for deduction. It's cool, it rocks!

Because of the non-Euclidean levels, you may click and hold on a discovered tile and see which tiles are next to it. This convenience tells of a polished game. I also found no bugs whatsoever.

[h1]Recommended even at full price[/h1]

I beat the 49 levels just short of 2 hours, so its only qualm is its short length. Though, for a $2 polished game with a unique twist, I think that's just fine.

[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/9997062/]~Twistorian Curator~[/url]

40277469.review:
I really like this game. 

Definitely recommend it if you like puzzle games in general. Price is right, 
Everything is restful and simple. Minimalistic approach works here - chill music, nice graphics and easy controls.
The "story" (*hehe*) goes gently harder with every level and new puzzle mechanics are introduced. Everything is smooth and well done. The puzzles are not too simple, also not too hard. Everything is solvable, no outside help needed.

It was really addictive. Like Civilization game, it created the feeling - "just one more turn" and I felt a bit sad when the game politely said "Thnx for playing".

So yeah, if you like a good puzzle game and have some time to relax with coffee - this game is for you.

added: 21/02/2018

40203070.review: Delete does a good job taking Minesweeper style puzzles into 3 dimensions in a polished way. These puzzles feel closer to the original Minesweeper than the Hexcells series, though both games feel similar. The one difference about this game is that the numbers dynamically change to represent the number of undiscovered bombs next to the tile rather than the total number. This took me a little getting used to, but it allows the puzzles to involve rotation and movement of sections, which is a really neat element. The adjacencies can sometimes be a little unclear, but clicking on any number highlights its neighbors which mitigates this completely. You're limited in the number of mistakes you can make on any given puzzle, and going over that amount automatically resets the puzzle (you get enough mistakes though that this isn't an issue). There is however no manual reset other than using that mechanic, which is initially a little confusing. The minimalist design and ambient sounds complement the good puzzles to make the game quite enjoyable. It took me around 2 hours to complete all the levels, which, given the price, is fair. Overall a great puzzle game that I quite enjoyed. If you're interested in this I'd also recommend checking out the Hexcells games as they're similar and also well made.

40172739.review:

Le seul gros bémol : j'ai passé a travers le jeu en 2H30, bien que pour le prix ca soit respectable, j'aurais bien aimé avoir plus de tableau.

40065716.review:
Pour ceux qui ne le savent pas, j'aime les jeux à succès steam et surtout les jeux à réflexion.
Et j'adore le démineur sur le PC... maintenant qu'il n'y a plus moyen d'y jouer gratuitement, j'ai téléchargé sur mon téléphone... Bref, ça, on s'en fiche.

(+) Delete est un démineur intelligent. Ce n'est pas que de la recherche de mines en 2D. Il fait aussi intervenir des plateformes qui translatent et tournent et en relief. Le jeu est propre, un peu mélodique et très facile à prendre en main. Les déplacements sont smooth. Si on est pas c omme moi, on ne se perd pas entre le bouton droit (pose de mines) et gauche (découverte du terrain) et on y arrive sans jamais faire de fautes !
Il arrive quelques fois seulement qu'on se retrouve dans une situation à deux fins possibles... ou alors c'est juste moi qui n'ai pas fait attention à la grille.

(-) Mon seul regret est qu'il n'y ait pas plus de niveaux. S'il vous plaît, faîtes plus de niveaux :( !

Je recommande ce jeu pour quiconque aime les succès faciles et les minis jeux du genre.

(Et si vous connaissez pas, allez jeter un oeil à Hexcell, un autre jeu du genre auquel ce jeu me fait penser =))

40025463.review:
What a great game! Delete takes the Minesweeper basic idea and makes something entirely new and fresh. This game really pushes the minimalist puzzle genre forward. I have not finished the game yet, discovering the logic is part of the fun so I'll take my time and savor it over several sessions. I did get stuck early, before the first new mechanic was introduced and checked the forums just to be sure that all the levels have logical solutions. They do, I just didn't see them right off the bat. That is high praise. I won't spoil it, but just wait until you get the first new mechanic that really takes advantage of the multiple planes of play.  Fantastic ideas.

One thing I'd like to see change is the addition of a reset button front and center. There are ways to reset a level without it but I really need one as I like to experiment until I have fully grasped the mechanic.

此游戏全通关，在这里发布评测只是提供一个基本万能的指导技巧
注：[A,B,C]3 表示在A块、B块和C块中一共有3颗雷

当[A,B,C]2  [B,C,D]3  时
此时可以推断出D块中有1雷，A中无雷。因为二者相比较，前者多A少D，后者少A多D，肯定是D有雷A无雷才能导致后者比前者多一个雷
类似的还有：
[A,B,C,D,E]2  [C,D,E,F]3  中AB都无雷，F有雷
[A,B,C,D]1 [C,D,E,F,G]4  中AB都无雷，EFG都有雷

39869878.review:
[quote]欢迎加入我们论坛： [url=http://www.lodosb.com/]lodosb[/url]←点击加入，讨论热门游戏还可以咨询steam相关的各种问题
欢迎关注我们的鉴赏家：[url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/29426545/]全球顶级吹水鉴赏家[/url] ←点击加入，查看精彩评测[/quote]

游戏名：Delete

鉴赏类型：推荐

游戏分类：解密游戏

[h1]steam短评[/h1]

扫雷这一微软电脑预设的游戏相信大家也玩过,而这游戏正是巧妙利用了扫雷的某些元素,创造了共50个别出新颖的3D拼图式解密关卡。如果你是喜欢拼图式解密游戏的人,这游戏是相当之适合你。因为关卡设定上许多变化和音乐算悦耳,加上售价便宜,玩家可试试。

[h1]完整评价[/h1]

[b]玩法上的特点[/b]

如短评所述,游戏巧妙利用了扫雷的元素。用鼠标左键开地,用鼠标右键标地雷位置,以下用[url=https://i.imgur.com/DyUmgZm.png]图[/url]来简述一下:

A. 全场剩余地雷数:

B. 生命值:每关有3次错误机会,错误左键开地雷地或用鼠标右键标没地雷位置会损失一生命值,生命值归0会重来

C. 开过的地: 开出来的数字不是乱给，而是其数字代表周围的八格(不只是平地)内有多少地雷。例如1代表周围有一个地雷，2代表周围有两个地雷。

D. 已标过地雷的地雷位置:每标一个左上全场剩余地雷数和附近开过的地的显示地雷数会减一

E. 未开过的地

游戏每一关都以开所有地和标上所有地雷位置为过关条件。随着关卡越来越高,会有更多元素,

种种添加的元素让游戏不会只是单纯的扫雷,变得更有可玩性,相当吸睛。

By ( ◜◡‾)っ✂╰⋃╯

39866109.review: 一个很有意思的小游戏。本来打算PUBG的OB时间来玩的，没忍住直接通了哈哈哈哈。游戏中的音乐悦耳耐听，让人感觉轻松写意。喜欢扫雷的小伙伴可以拥有绝佳的游戏体验。不过一筹莫展时不要忘了你还有一个叫做截图的手段哦~

39858664.review:
安くてキレイでポーっとしながらでもプレイできるお手軽なパズルゲーム。

ゲームルールとしてはマインスイーパーとHexcellsの間の様なゲームで、周囲にあるアタリの数を表示している数字をヒントにしてコマをめくっていくゲーム。
3Dギミックもあって楽しませてくれます。
音楽も邪魔にならない感じで好みでした。

UIも良くできていて、既に開いた数字ボタンを押すと、数字が示すマスの色が変わって教えてくれるなど、とても親切で、初心者にも優しくて好感が持てます。

難易度は無印Hexcellsより簡単。
ボーっとしながらプチプチやってたら4.5時間ぐらいでクリアできたので、手軽にプレイするのに良いサイズのゲームだと思います。

39831864.review: Very fun puzzle game. The ambient music and different tones of the blocks create a nice, relaxing feeling. While it is a short game, the puzzles themselves are solid, and the $2 price point is very fair. Took me about 2 hours to beat the game fully.

39828990.review:
The first few levels make it seem like a simple Minesweeper clone with an isometric view and ambient music. You click on squares, the numbers go down and with a bit of exclusionary logic you can pinpoint which ones happen to be clear and which ones are read.

But then you get these neat switches which alter the isometric puzzle areas by having them slide and connect (or disconnect) in different parts. This in turns shifts the numbers around based on the new formations. A new layer of complexity, but a very pleasant one to pick apart. 

A level or so later there's also a new type of number field which gives you the amount of red squares in a connected line, rather than just those surrounding it. And if an upcoming stage has switches you can again slide those new squares around to make new lines and determine red squares on multiple line variations.

I am on level 10 of 50. The screenshots hint at some additional mechanics down the line, which fills me with enough anticipatory excitement that I am actually trying to avert my eyes from them, so as not to be spoiled. Which is probably one of the highest praises you can give to a puzzle game. Or perhaps any game, really. Surprises. Unpredictable, fresh-feeling ideas. Something that makes you say "Ah, that's rather clever."

So, yeah, buy it. It's only 2 euros or dollars anyway.

39825350.review: I like minesweeper and this game is well inspired by it but introducing a lot of new mechanisms so i like it too. No timer, no stress, relaxing musics and when you click it's like you play piano. I really like playing this game juste before going to bed. The creator of this game is definetely a good minesweeper player because the levels are really good. Well done ! For the price you will have a really good game for 3-4 hours. Worth it !

39821275.review:
Krótkie i przyjemne. Wariacja na temat starego sapera. Tutaj w 3D z wieloma dodatkowymi smaczkami w rodzaju przekręcania części planszy (trochę to przypomina pod tym względem kostkę rubika). W przeciwieństwie do sapera plansze nie są generowane losowo, za to nigdy nie trzeba zgadywać (jeśli ma się takie wrażenie, to znaczy, że za krótko się główkowało), do wszystkiego można logicznie dojść.

Jedyna wada to długość - całość zajęła mi niecałe 3 godziny. Z drugiej strony czy to jest wada przy takiej cenie, chyba nie. Jedno jest pewne - nie zdążyłem się znudzić.

39820079.review: Nice little game in the Hexcells/Squarecells vein although not as quite as elegant as Matthew Brown's efforts.  Enjoyable with some nice mechanics and well worth the (very modest) price tag.  Recommended.

但是有點可惜的是，雖然是踩地雷的玩法，但是再多失敗個幾次之後就會發現到，其實地圖上的每一顆地雷位置是不變的，這個情況在越後面的關卡顯得越來越破壞遊戲的體驗，因為只要你照著失敗時的方法慢慢地重現，基本上就能夠「錯到贏」，頓時會感覺有點乏味。
總的來說，這是一款有趣的小品遊戲，最適合在您在無聊之餘，可以點開來紓解一下

39765556.review:
立体マインスイーパー。お手付きをステージごとに設定された回数以内に抑え、全てのマスを開くとクリア。
だが従来のマインスイーパーをただ立体にしただけではなく、特定のマスにだけ影響する特殊ヒントやボタンを押すと変形するステージなどかなり工夫されている。特に変形ステージはガショガショ組み変わるブロックが見ていて楽しい。

ステージ数は値段相応。１～２時間ほどで全ステージクリア、実績解除できる。

お手付きを繰り返すとステージを最初からやり直すことになるが、問題の内容が変わるわけではないので一度開いたマスを記憶してのゴリ押しも可能。別にペナルティとかはないので、好きな解き方でどうぞ。

続編や類似品があればぜひプレイしたい。「ちょっと新しいパズルでも」という気分なら、買って損はしないと思う。

39728124.review:
一款非常烧脑的“扫雷”游戏！
背景音乐很舒服，虽然解密难度有点高，也能使玩家乐在其中~！

刚开始上手是有点懵，完全不知道啥意思，我甚至掏出手机拍照记下答案。。。
好在steam商店有个动态图演示，看了一会儿就懂了，现在很沉迷~！

话说，这么烧脑的游戏，成就有点儿少啊~~~ ┑(￣Д ￣)┍

但是！本作非常优秀~！很好玩~！

39725694.review: 3D版扫雷，整体难度一般，一个半小时就通了，玩着的时候很欢快，各种机关的创意都很棒。

39719718.review:

39715458.review:
Mines crossed with rubic cube (and few other principes). Its quite challenge in later levels, altough you can pass it by remembering numbers (they are same all time). I didnt use that method at all, as i finished almost all levels at first try. It took me 1 hour and 40 minutes, so its quite short, but still its much fun for little price.

So big thumb up!

39714625.review: Minesweeper in 3D with some additional possibilities and special blocks, I like this game. It wasn't too easy for sure, especially in later stages, but still it was rather relaxing. I would love to get more levels, because the game ends pretty quickly (for me a bit under 3h). Looking forward to get some expansion, with new stages.

39712450.review:
One of the better puzzle games on Steam.

Simplistic, well made, and not too difficult.
Introduces new mechanics fairy regulary.

+ it costs just 2€. Pretty reasonable price for 1-3 hours of relaxing puzzle solving.

39711920.review:
https://youtu.be/6b8bdRSgT8s <- gameplay video

Delete is a Zen Minesweeper for your desktop. There are simple controls, and even with my short time with it, the gameplay varies rapidly. For the price, a game like this shouldn't be passed up.

39708665.review:
육각면체 속 지뢰찾기.

딱 지뢰찾기 게임을 3차원 육각면체로 옮겨온 게임. 스팀에 존재하는 미니멀리즘 퍼즐 게임이 전부 그렇듯 깔끔한 색감과 적당히 참신한 느낌의 퍼즐, 1-2시간 정도면 클리어가 가능한 분량의 컨텐츠를 자랑한다. 지뢰찾기에서 봤을 법한 룰들을 잘 가져왔고 각 퍼즐들의 난이도 역시 무난한 편. 

보기보다 난이도가 조금 있는 퍼즐 게임이고 맨 후반부 퍼즐은 방향이나 위치에 따라 숫자가 달라져 풀기가 꽤 복잡해진다. 이건 그냥 개인적인 문제인 듯 한데, 일부 퍼즐에서 더 이상 추론이 안 되 답을 찍어야 하는 상황이 자주 발생했다. 그냥 내가 아만보였을 확률이 높긴 하지만. 만약에 아니라면... 

가격도 저렴하니 가볍게 사서 풀어 넘기기 좋은 퍼즐 게임.

39698226.review:
加入空间感的扫雷，有很多易用性设计，每关点击时音效有变化，很悦耳。
扫雷铁粉的又一新宠，有潜力。

39685485.review: Nice take on logic puzzles.  Introducing the spatial elements is engaging and fun.  I wish it were longer!

39683280.review:
喜欢扫雷的玩家一定会喜欢这款游戏

1.右键之后数字会变化，这对手速快以及习惯扫雷的玩家不太友好，但这是这个游戏的风格和特色。
2.关卡很少，而且混着简单的教学关。总体难度不高，可以都推出来，也可以XJB点通关。
3.画面和点击的感觉很棒。游戏方式有新意。

总的来说玩两个小时确实可以，值得推荐。

39678041.review:
感谢开发者当初在steamcn上私信的key

今天看了好友列表才发现游戏正式发行了，来补个好评

游戏的画面和音乐都营造了一种适合解谜的氛围，不必赘述，自行体会

本以为方块上的数字可变，仅仅为了方便推理
后来发现，可变形的结构 + 数字变化 本身就是推理的一部分
谜题虽不难，但是设计巧妙

目前对我来说，游戏除了关卡数量的限制，就已经没有缺点了

[spoiler]当初玩的时候，默认的左右键是反的，玩了几关不明所以，后来发现左右键功能可自行交换，才理解了所谓的“类扫雷”是什么意思
不过后来更新时把默认左右键功能对调，就没这个问题了。[/spoiler]

39677529.review:
介四里没有挽过的船新版本扫雷。
大扎好，我系向日葵游戏，Delete，介四里没有挽过的船新版本，挤需体验三番钟，里造会干我一样，爱象借款游戏。
这款游戏的规则玩法和扫雷一样，需要计算并标记雷的位置，不同之处在于由传统的2D改成了3D（鼠标左键长按数字可以高亮显示相邻的格子）。
欢迎大家关注我们的鉴赏家：http://store.steampowered.com/curator/28763059

39673556.review:
大家好，我来自一个小的鉴赏家，我是免费收到了开发者送的游戏副本。我很荣幸。这个游戏真的很棒，音乐风格给人一种深处艺术的氛围之中。简单来说就是一个3D版的扫雷。买给小朋友玩一玩非常好。

但是在这里我一定要说，很多人都不知道扫雷是怎么玩的。建议开发者在游戏中加入规则以及玩法。不是所有人都有耐心去查玩法的。

往往这种极简风格的游戏，更需要引导。现代人的节奏太快，已经很少会有人去研究游戏的规则了。添加规则的同时要注意尽量简单。不要繁琐，至少要让人知道扫雷是怎么玩的，如何通关。

推荐这款游戏。

39669152.review: If you like/enjoy solving minesweepers and 3D Picross, I heartely recommend this game as it is very pleasant to play.

39660654.review: Hra Delete je krátká, minimalistická logická hra, podobná například sérii Hexcells nebo Hledání min. Máte herní pole složené ze čtverců a u některých máte odhalena čísla. Ta značí počet čtverců, které máte v přilehlé oblasti označit. Přidanou hodnotou je fakt, že tentokrát se jede ve třetím rozměru, což s sebou nese trošku vyšší obtížnost. Ale nenechte se zmást, zas tak tahle hra těžká není a dohrajete ji za nějaké dvě hodiny. A i když tohle nemá na sérii Hexcells, rozhodně stojí za koupi, ať už kvůli ceně, zábavnosti nebo originálnosti některých prvků, které jsou postupně přidávány. Chce to druhý díl s delší herní dobou.

39660178.review: Very interesting mechanics, just wish there was more of it!

39657585.review: 这游戏真好玩，我要充一个亿！！

39652830.review:
if you like [b]minesweeper[/b], [b]hexcells[/b] & co. or [b]push[/b], you'll like this game as well. 50 levels, new mechanics are introduced at a steady pace, no timers, ratings or anything, but levels do reset after the 3rd mistake. no guessing necessary, but occasional misclicks can happen, so I'm glad it doesn't reset immediately, but at the same time I would've liked a reset button, so I could start over when I made a mistake and found out what was under a certain tile. the developer's suggestion to make continuous mistakes until it resets is far from ideal.

further downsides are the price (it's not expensive, but costs twice as much as minimalistic puzzlers usually go for, including the developer's previous game, [b]lineway[/b]), the lack of volume sliders and losing progress on the level you were doing if you quit. most levels don't take long, but it'd still be nice to be able to continue where I left off. and since progress is stored in the registry, there's no cloud saving either.

it's nicely presented and the sound effects are a lot better than in [b]lineway[/b], but they don't play when you click, only a bit later, which I found annoying and turned the effects off. with a few quality of life improvements it'd be great, but it's still a good game overall, worth playing, should take a couple of hours or so to complete.

39642798.review:
可能是我道行不够。。。不明所以- -

39631635.review: 3D版 踩地雷 相當有趣

39629546.review:
Delete is a very decent minimalistic puzzler that expands minesweeper into the third dimension. New mechanics are introduced one at a time and the latter puzzles provide for a moderately brain-twisting challenge. I particulartly like that the clues always show the amount of currently remaining mines in the vicinity which sort of allows for a different solution perspective.

For the low price it's a definitive recommendation for a rainy afternoon.

39623816.review:
Another excellent small game from this developer. Bought it as soon as it became available.

Pros:
- Fun level design: all levels are short and the mechanics are easy to understand.
- Graphical design: I really like the colours and the minimal design.
- Duration: can be finished in one evening.
- Did not encounter any bugs

Cons:
- ?

立体構造なマインスイーパ的なパズル。

もうちょっとステージ数が欲しかったけど値段相応かも。

39613076.review:
Nagyon tetszik, igazi agyat átverős játék a 3d-s kockás hatásnak köszönhetően.. Nézed a pályát, elpillantasz majd vissza, teljesen máshogy kinézőnek tűnik a játék ha már elég ideje nézed a pályát 
Az eredeti aknakereső után szokni kell egy kicsit hogy a számok csökkennek és az 1-es mellett ha már van akna akkor lehet még.
A zene lehetne változatosabb, az sajnos monoton.

39608002.review:
[h1]如果你問我DELETE值不值得買，我想你得先問問自己，你有多愛踩地雷?[/h1]

Pony作為開發商，最大的特長就是在既有的遊戲上加入新點子，這點跟前作LINEWAY是以FLOW為基礎去加入其他元素有異曲同工之妙，Arzola's同時也有差不多的能力，兩家推出的遊戲都能讓你靜靜地體會其中的樂趣。

明亮的畫面、簡單的玩法、逐漸添加的要素、柔和的音樂與你自己的思考空間。

個人對益智遊戲的評鑑標準一向如此，而照此標準來看，我可以說這遊戲再貴三倍我都會入手。

[h1]結論[/h1]

搶先為2018益智遊戲立下標準的佳作，流暢的遊戲體驗，遊玩時數CP值高，推薦入手。

39606404.review:
Необычная головоломка, в которой вам нужно угадать где красный и где желтый квадраты. ЛКМ - окрываются желтые, ПКМ - красные. Вам дается несколько попыток ошибиться, после их использования начинается уровень с начала.

Игру можно проходить двумя способами:

1) Для тех кто хочет добыть все достижения и при этом не напрягать мозги, тыкать на все подряд, и запоминать где находятся красные квадраты, уровень пройдете с нескольких попыток.

2) Для любителей головоломок, открывая желтые квадраты вам будет дана подсказка скалько находится рядом красных квадратов, далее открываем поля по типу сапера.

Интересно, необычно, есть что то новое, рекомендовано для любителей поломать голову.

Еще вы можете посмотреть обзоры на другие игры:
http://store.steampowered.com/curator/25737869/
Так же подписывайтесь на нашу группу с халявными раздачами:
https://steamcommunity.com/groups/freeekeys

39606306.review:
Старый добрый сапер, но уже со своими новыми современными фишками.
Приятная музыка, уровни, над которыми придётся пораздумывать. Если Вам нравятся головоломки, то эта игра для вас:)

10 нулей из 10!

39603567.review:
출시되기 전, 이 게임을 흘깃 봤을 땐 단순히 지뢰찾기 3d 같은 느낌을 받았다.
그러나 소개 영상에서 꽤나 흥미를 느꼈고, 출시된 것을 알자마자 바로 해보았다.

큐브 자체를 회전시킨다던가, 특정 방향으로만 지뢰를 센다던가 등 머리를 굴리게 하는 요소가 꽤나 많았고,
덕분에 짧은 시간이나마 재밌게 할 수 있었다.

개인적으로 딱 한가지 아쉬웠던 점은 생각보다 퍼즐의 수가 적었다는 것이다.

Daily Challenge 같은 것이 나온다면 아마도 오래 할 수 있을 것 같은 게임이다.

ps. 지뢰찾기에서는 0인 칸에 대고 양쪽 마우스를 동시에 클릭하면
근처 8칸을 동시에 마우스로 좌클릭하는 효과를 낼 수 있었던 것으로 기억하는데,
이 게임은 안타깝게도 그런 기능은 없었다.

39603211.review:
喜欢扫雷的朋友可以试一下，蛮有意思，2小时通关。感觉有些地方推理不出来，必须要靠猜

第二天追加：之前投机取巧了，今天又重头玩了一遍，果然如开发者说的一样，所有的都可以推理出来！！！确实好游戏

39602364.review: Это сапёр в новом стиле, в котором решает рандом, а не твои размышления. Мне не понравилась эта головоломка
